item.title: Gadgets. I like gadgets. I found lots of them when I went looking. I probably could've found more but I was afraid to go into the attic! Here's a selection.
item.description:
Gadgets.  I like gadgets.  I found lots of them when I went looking.  I probably could've found more but I was afraid to go into the attic! Here's a selection.

I did have 2 Apple TVs (1st and 2nd Gen) but they're really not necessary anymore with all the streaming available on all the other platforms now.  I have a chromecast for the bedroom, but that's just to use an idle 24" monitor.  Sometimes there are football matches on at 3-4am - with the chromecast I can watch them in bed.
